name: deadball5
description:
controls: WASD or arrow keys to move the ball

spacebar to jump

F1 enables the console, which you can use the "load [map name]" command to load hidden levels... tsk tsk

the game features copyrighted music by deadmau5.. uh yea i think thats enough to say about it. don't sue me.

this was based off the roll-a-ball tutorial, I'm thinking of making it into something.
